competitors.name: Compuware Gomez
competitors.notes: Parent company of Dynatrace, web performance monitoring

context: In 2010, Dynatrace was part of Compuware (acquired 2008 as dynaTrace software). The APM market was dominated by on-premises enterprise solutions from HP, CA, and IBM. New Relic was just launching as cloud-native alternative. Application performance monitoring was evolving from infrastructure monitoring to application-centric views. Dynatrace differentiated with PurePath technology for transaction tracing. The market was preparing for cloud and SaaS transformation.
